General.Name: TROOPS Inc
General.Description: TROOPS, Inc., along with its subsidiaries, operates in the money lending business in Hong Kong and Australia. The company provides mortgage, personal, and corporate loans. It also develops, operates, and manages an online financial marketplace that offers one-stop financial technology solutions, including API services. Additionally, TROOPS, Inc. offers fintech and IT support services, such as artificial intelligence, big data, blockchain technology, machine learning, fingerprint ID, facial recognition, and cloud computing services. Furthermore, the company is involved in money lending, property investment, applications, technology and services, consultancy services for insurance products, advisory and referral services, leasing, and management services. Formerly known as SGOCO Group, Ltd., the company changed its name to TROOPS, Inc. in November 2021.TROOPS, Inc. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Unit A, Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong
